name: Star Spawn Seer
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Out-of-Phase Movement: The seer can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. Each creature it moves through takes 5 (1d10) psychic damage; no creature can take this damage more than once per turn. The seer takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
